title: God is Kind
description:
Readings from:

Isaiah 63:7

Jeremiah 9:23-24

Titus 3:3-5a

Today's passages were read by Karl Vaters. Karl has been in pastoral ministry for almost 40 years. He is the teaching pastor of Cornerstone Christian Fellowship, a healthy small church in Orange County, California, where he has ministered for over 27 years.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
